page.title: 06RIDING CENTRE WOOKEY HOLE
page.content:
EBBORLANDS RIDING CENTRE HAS A VERY FRIENDLY ATMOSPHERE. YOU CAN HAVE A LESSON IN THE INDOOR OR OUTDOOR SCHOOL, OR HAVE A HACK.
THEY HAVE APPROXIMATELY TWENTY PONIES AND HORSES, AND ABOUT FIVE QUALIFIED INSTRUCTORS WITH LOTS OF HELPERS.
RIDES ARE OVER THE MENDIP HILLS, THROUGH THE WOODS AND FIELDS,OR ON ROADS OR TRACKS. IF YOU ARE NEW TO RIDING THERE ARE LOTS OF SMALL PONIES AND YOU WILL BE TAUGHT TO RIDE PROPERLY. IF YOU DON'T HAVE EQUIPMENT YOU CAN BORROW A HAT OR RIDING CROP.
THE CENTRE IS KNOWN LOCALLY AS ONE OF THE BEST CENTRES IN THE AREA AND THE CHARGES ARE THOUGHT TO BE QUITE REASONABLE.
